head.supplied: 20/7/91 ¶ ¶ In my contribution to your report, dear Mr Stirling, ¶ an omission occurs. Where I speak of clearing scrub for extending pastural areas, should be added "without infringing on the source...

div.p: A91/12488, unit 22, VPRS 619 Secretary's Correspondence Files, VA 538 Department of Crown Lands and Survey, Public Record Office, Victoria.

In my contribution to your report, dear Mr Stirling,
See M to J. Stirling, 19 July 1891 (in this edition as 91-07-19b). an omission occurs. Where I speak of clearing scrub for extending pastural areas, should be added "without infringing on the sources of Rivers and banks of water-courses". Will you kindly insert this? After Summary might be added "for present consideration and purposes".
I should like to have a proof-print for final correction, before the Document is issued . Where Basket willows are mentioned, as to be naturalized at Brooks, "and the Hazel" should be added also.
